feed.title: Whats New on Devdocs
feed.description: This page contains recent changes that we think you'd like to know about. We exclude from this list proofreading, spelling checks, and all minor updates.

entry.title: Major Update
entry.summary: Added Magento Cloud Patches v 1.0.5 Release Notes.

entry.title: Major Update
entry.summary: Added Magento Cloud Components v 1.0.4 Release Notes.

entry.title: Major update
entry.summary: Added an Error message reference for ece-tools with error listing and suggested actions to resolve build and deploy issues.

entry.title: Technical
entry.summary: Added the wizard:split-db-state command to the Smart wizards topic in the Cloud Guide.

entry.title: Technical
entry.summary: Updated the Deploy variables topic in the Cloud Guide to add the REDIS_BACKEND environment variable to configure the Redis backend model for Redis cache for Magento 2.3.5 and later.

entry.title: Technical
entry.summary: Updated the Import URL Rewrites topic with guidance about checking the PHP file upload limit to prevent errors when uploading a large file for importing URL rewrites.

entry.title: Technical
entry.summary: Added instructions to complete functional testing for Magento Cloud packages in the Docker environment. See Magento Cloud code testing.

entry.title: Technical
entry.summary: Added instructions for using the Magento Baler extension to bundle javascript content during the Magento Cloud build process. See Static content deployment.

entry.title: Technical
entry.summary: Added information about the Cloud error log (var/log/Cloud.error.log) which contains all error and warning messages from the latest deployment of the Cloud environment.

entry.title: New topic
entry.summary: Updated the Xdebug configuration instructions for Magento Cloud Docker, which now requires using the --with-xdedug option to build a container to handle Xdebug requests instead of adding the Xdebug configuration to the .magento.app.yaml file.

entry.title: New Topic
entry.summary: Added basic instructions for configuring and using Blackfire.io for performance testing in a Magento Cloud Docker environment. See Add Blackfire.io to Magento Cloud Docker.

entry.title: Technical
entry.summary: Added an example using the --no-varnish option to skip Varnish container installation when building a Magento Cloud Docker environment. See the Varnish container topic in the Cloud Guide.

entry.title: Technical
entry.summary: Documented the new es-en-var option to customize the Elasticsearch container configuration when building the Docker Compose file for a Magento Cloud Docker environment. See Elasticsearch container.

entry.title: Technical
entry.summary: Added instructions for running Docker on a custom host and port. See Docker configuration topic in the Cloud Guide.

entry.title: Technical
entry.summary: Added information about the default Varnish container configuration to the Docker services containers topic in the Cloud Guide.

entry.title: New Topic
entry.summary: Added two new REST endpoints that add support for the Inventory Management In-store Pickup feature.

entry.title: Major Update
entry.summary: Clarified that you must install and configure Elasticsearch 7.6.x before upgrading to Magento 2.4.0.

entry.title: New Topic
entry.summary: Added the pickupLocations query, which returns a list of locations that customers can use to pick up their orders.

entry.title: Major Update
entry.summary: Updated Pro architecture topics to reflect new enhanced Integration environment provisioning and added recommendations for using Pro Staging and Integration environments.

entry.title: Major Update
entry.summary: Added the Stale cache options section to L2 caching in the Magento application.
